name: Nominatim
short_desc: Locally-hosted geocoding server with a simple UI
description: Nominatim uses OpenStreetMap data to find locations on Earth by name and address (geocoding). It can also do the reverse, find an address for any location on the planet. This app combines the Nominatim server with a debugging UI.

form_fields.label: OSM data file
form_fields.hint: See geofabrik.de for downloads; this is a *.osm.pbf file.
